name: HomeIsWhereTheHeartIs
description:
Home is where the heart is, unfortunately for Tim he is a ghost and just can't get comfortable in his eternal abode. Looks like he'll need to take someone else's if he's going to really settle down.

Looks like he'll need to take someone else's, if he's going to really settle down.  Collect 8 Hearts to best in your grave, but don't get caught. 

Use the arrow keys to move around, easy. (This is a windows based game)

This game is a submission for @globalgamejam 2019. It's a fun little isometric stealth game.  

All the jammers here @pulsecollege will have their games up today, so give them a look if you get a chance.
